author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The Pocket Fit is AYANEO's first handheld under their KONKR sub-brand.  It has a powerful Snapdragon G3 Gen3 processor (and SD 8 Elite option), great controls, and an impressively nice LCD panel.  It's also being sold at an uncharacteristically low price point.  So what's the catch?  (Spoiler: there isn't one.)

More info: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pocket-fit-premier-hi-performance-android-handheld/x/18018320#/

Hype Stix: http://hypestix.com/
Sakura Retro sticks: https://www.etsy.com/listing/1867195712/ultimate-stick-mod-for-ayn-odin-2-portal
Android handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo
PC gaming on Android: https://youtu.be/uPhMDCA2iEA

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.
